meanings.definition: The state or quality of being fuzzy.
meanings.sent1: The foziness of the blanket made it extra cozy.
meanings.sent2: I love the foziness of my favorite teddy bear.
meanings.sent3: The foziness of the puzzle pieces made it hard to see where they fit.
meanings.sent4: Her memory had a foziness to it, like trying to recall a dream.
meanings.sent5: The foziness of the peach skin felt like a gentle hug.

meanings.definition: A feeling of confusion or disorientation.
meanings.sent1: The foziness in my head after the rollercoaster ride was intense.
meanings.sent2: His foziness about the directions led us in circles.
meanings.sent3: The foziness of the magic trick left the audience amazed.
meanings.sent4: The foziness of the situation made it hard to make a decision.
meanings.sent5: The foziness of the fog made it impossible to see ahead.

meanings.sent1: The foziness of the kitten's fur was irresistible.
meanings.sent2: The foziness of the clouds made them look like cotton candy.
meanings.sent3: The foziness of the marshmallows melted in the hot chocolate.
meanings.sent4: The foziness of the pillow made it perfect for a nap.
meanings.sent5: The foziness of the sweater kept me warm on a chilly day.
